name: DuckNPunch
description:
DuckNPunch is a local multiplayer fighter where, as the name suggests, you duck and you punch to victory. Plug your controller in, grab a friend and punch away. 

**Controls**

By default, the game is made to play with a controller and keyboard. But, you'll be able to split the keyboard within the pause menu using the change input screen. 

Choose the needed keyboard scheme for the controller player in the input screen as shown in the screenshot to change to all-keyboard controls.

Keyboard1 - A/D to move, W to hit, S to duck

Controller - Left/Right (Dpad) to move, X (Xinput) to hit, Down (Dpad) to duck

Keyboard2 - Left/Right arrows to move, Up arrow to hit, Down arrow to duck 

**Note**

DuckNPunch is also pretty early in its development and hence, it may be a little rough around the edges. Let me know in the comments if you encounter any game-breaking glitches.
